vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Ἰάρετ (Rec. -ρέδ, L, Ἰάρεθ), ὁ (Heb. יֶרֶד, LXX Ἰάρεδ, FlJ, Ἰάρεδος),
Jared (Gen.5:15): Luk.3:37.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time before the Flood, first mentioned at Gen.5.15;
son of: Mahalalel (H4111);
father of: Enoch (H2585H)
§ Jared, "servant"
Jared, (Proper name), indeclinable, Lk. 3:37*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
雅列 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "後裔 "
上古時代元老之一, 以諾的父親 (路 3:37)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
雅列 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "后裔 "
上古时代元老之一, 以诺的父亲 (路 3:37)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: Gia-rết « đầy tớ » xem H3382: Stk 5:15,16,18,19.
